Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach

Annotation Interface ProjectInfo

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(MODULE) public @interface ProjectInfo
Indicates that the annotated module is a project declaration.

In other words, it transforms an annotated module-info.java compilation unit into a logical project-info.java compilation unit.

This annotation declares a set of untargeted nested annotations intended solely for use as a member type in complex annotation type declarations. They cannot be used to annotate anything directly.
